channel.title: CVE Feed for knative -- serving
channel.description: The latest CVEs for knative -- serving

item.title: CVE-2023-48713|2024-10-11T17:58:05.682Z -- knative -- serving
item.description: Knative Serving builds on Kubernetes to support deploying and serving of applications and functions as serverless containers. An attacker who controls a pod to a degree where they can control the responses from the /metrics endpoint can cause Denial-of-Service of the autoscaler from an unbound memory allocation bug. This is a DoS vulnerability, where a non-privileged Knative user can cause a DoS for the cluster. This issue has been patched in version 0.39.0.
